The 'Germantown Equity Strategic Planning' is the outcome of CPLN 600 under the guidance of Lauren Parker. In the 4 months study and research, our team achieved comprenhensive understanding of Germantown and promted Equity Strategic Planning for the Germantown's next 10 years development.

If you want to see the complete version of our planning, please check the [link](https://online.fliphtml5.com/paeqb/antv/) and see the full planning book.
